content: Crescent Medical Center research brief: 42-year-old male (DOB 08/15/1981) enrolled in CAR-T cell therapy trial NCT05673287. Unusual presentation of autoimmune encephalitis with prior refractive rituximab treatment. Requires coordination between neurology and rheumatology departments. Next evaluation scheduled April 5, 2024. Contact: trial_coord@crescentmed.org
